item.title: Clean Code Book Summary
item.description: The book Clean Code by Robert C Martin, changed the way I think about and write code. Why Clean Code? Have a look at the image below which is from the book I love this image. It clearly shows the frustration of developers reading bad code. Clean code leads to code which other developers can understand quickly. Developers can easily change code without breaking any existing features. A code which takes more time to make changes and is difficult to understand will decrease the team productivity
